The user clutches their [[sword]] in both hands, focusing their chakra into their blade. From there, they launch a powerful downward slash. It is powerful enough to disperse a massive fireball. 

== Trivia ==
* Based on the name, this technique is presumably associated with [[Mifune]].
* {{translation|Tachi|太刀}} describes a type of longsword, and also refers to a sword positioned with the blade facing down.
